narrative=Mohamed Lawrence, who recently moved to the area, was last seen by his brother, Marc Miller, near the bathroom of a warehouse on Cardross Road. Reports suggest he wandered into a nearby cave. His disappearance prompted a search, and he was eventually traced by police in Glasgow.
